sentences.sContent: The surest way is to set sail in one direction and not stop until you're home again.
sentences.sContent_eng: The surest way is to set sail in one direction and not stop until you're home again.
sentences.sCn: 最为确定的方法是向一个方向航行，而且不要停止知道你回到家为止。

sentences.sContent: We embarked on board a good ship, and, after recommending ourselves to God, set sail.
sentences.sContent_eng: We embarked on board a good ship, and, after recommending ourselves to God, set sail.
sentences.sCn: 我们搭乘了一艘很好的船，向上帝祈祷之后，启航了。

sentences.sContent: In 1966, Hubbard—who by then had met and married another woman, Mary Sue Whipp—set sail with a handful of Scientologists.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1966, Hubbard—who by then had met and married another woman, Mary Sue Whipp—set sail with a handful of Scientologists.
sentences.sCn: 1966年，哈伯德和少数山达基教徒启航出海了，在这之前他已经遇见另一个女人玛丽·苏维博并结了婚。
